remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintPort> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueuePort%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "QueuePort", not "Port" or "Queueport".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintPort> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueuePort%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "QueuePort", not "Port" or "Queueport".
